name: Underhero
description: Underhero is a 2D side-scroller RPG adventure game with timing-based combat, so no turns! Inspired by Paper Mario and other RPGs, it tells the story of a world where the chosen hero has failed and an underling of the main villain takes his place as the new “hero”.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Quad-Core Processor A6 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB VRAM, EVGA GeForce 210 DDR3,  ASUS AMD HD 5450, Intel HD Graphics 2000 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
